Introduction:
Welcome to InGame-Hostlist,
A mod that lets you use a hostlist from inside the game.

Usage instructions:
Before hosting/joining please go into the options menu,
to set your port and spectate options, as the game will
no longer propmpt you for them before each host.
You will also find settings for your host message and
whether you want your games to appear on the hostlist or not.\n
After that you can enter the hostlist via the 'Join' button,
or just host by pressing 'Host'.
Note: For ease of viewing you can switch between the Playing
and Waiting tabs from anywhere in the menu.

Also please remember to change your profile name before playing
online, have fun!

Press A/B to continue.
Consider changing your profile name before hosting, or press host again.
Do you want to join or spectate this host?
